name: Field
purpose: Provide semantic structure, labeling, validation, and layout for a single form control.
useWhen: Validation or error messaging is needed
Helper or descriptive text is present
rules: Field wraps exactly one logical control
Labels, descriptions, and errors belong to Field
Field controls orientation and grouping semantics
doNotUseWhen: Ephemeral inline controls with no semantic meaning
aiHints: Default to using Field for form inputs
Do not put validation logic on Input directly
